Name: MayBlues
About the game: Gif入れたい Overview A so-called Tsum Tsum-like puzzle game. Let's connect and erase the substances in his brain that have been sick due to May disease and make him happy! Gameplay Let's erase the substances in the brain until the time runs out! You can get points by connecting 3 or more substances in the brain! All you have to do is click the mouse! The more you connect, the more points you get and the longer you play! If you click on the energy drink that sometimes falls, the surrounding substances will disappear at once and you will get a high score! Aim for 1 million points! !! Gif入れたい
